channel.title: Need a banner. Might be simple, Might not
channel.description: Well, some of you know im making a game, and i will need a banner, Pretty simple (i hope) but just a open field, storming, and a blurry little kid running away from the point of view, nothing animated please.

item.description:

When I find a stock I’ll get you it…
